name: Rubik's Cube
synopsis: Play anywhere, anytime on the most authentic digital representation of the Rubik’s Cube available. Rubik's Cube is a 3-D combination puzzle invented in 1974 by Hungarian sculptor and professor of architecture Ernő Rubik. Game Features: Intuitive touch controls Cube 2x2x2 and Cube 3x3x3 Solver Camera Capture Internet rankings The game is developed under the license of the Rubik's Brand Ltd.
